entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , St. Catharines
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:59 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 08:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: -2.2°C
Wind: SSW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this morning. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 70 this morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain beginning in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
